headline: Energy Transition Today - Array Advances Solar Efficiency With Verified High-Voltage Systems
summary: In a recent development in the energy transition space, ARRAY Technologies has announced that its DuraTrack® and OmniTrack™ solar tracking systems have been verified by Intertek as compatible with 2000-volt module-wired systems. This confirmation aligns ARRAY with the industry's shift towards higher-voltage architectures aimed at enhancing efficiency and reducing costs in solar installations. By increasing system voltage from 1,500V to 2,000V, solar projects can potentially achieve reduced...
